org.springframework.data.redis.connection

接口 RedisClusterCommands

  • 所有已知子接口:
    DefaultedRedisClusterConnection, RedisClusterConnection
    所有已知实现类:
    JedisClusterConnection, LettuceClusterConnection

    public interface RedisClusterCommands
    Interface for the cluster commands supported by Redis. A RedisClusterNode can be obtained from clusterGetNodes() or it can be constructed using either host and RedisNode.getPort() or the node Id.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.7

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  RedisClusterCommands.AddSlots

      Assign slots to given RedisClusterNode.

      Assign RedisClusterNode.SlotRange.getSlotsArray() to given RedisClusterNode.
      Long clusterCountKeysInSlot(int slot)
      Count the number of keys assigned to one slot.
      void clusterDeleteSlots(RedisClusterNode node, int... slots)
      Remove slots from RedisClusterNode.

      Removes RedisClusterNode.SlotRange.getSlotsArray() from given RedisClusterNode.
      void clusterForget(RedisClusterNode node)
      Remove given node from cluster.
      org.springframework.data.redis.connection.ClusterInfo clusterGetClusterInfo()
      Get cluster information.

      Get keys served by slot.

      Retrieve information about masters and their connected slaves.

      Find the RedisClusterNode serving given key.

      Find the RedisClusterNode serving given slot.

      Retrieve cluster node information such as id, host, port and slots.

      Add given node to cluster.

      Assign a slave to given master.

      • clusterGetNodes

        Iterable<RedisClusterNode> clusterGetNodes()
        Retrieve cluster node information such as id, host, port and slots.
        返回:
        never null.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: CLUSTER NODES

        返回:
        never null.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: CLUSTER SLAVES
